name: AGNi for all Debian based linux

resources.title: v1.4
changelogs: Forked from xanmod.org
Merge Linux 5.17.9
scripts: force deb installer compression to xz
acpi: disable some Insyde BIOS related ERROR log
Using High responsiveness multitasking Task Type scheduler
ath10k: fix slow wifi speeds (tested on Qualcomm QCA9377)
net: ipv4: autoenable TCP_NODELAY to disable NAGLE's Algorithm
Using OEM drivers by Realtek known to have far better performance

resources.title: v1.0_beta-3
resources.md5: MIUI R, AOSP R(soon), AOSP S(soon)
changelogs: Under Beta Phase. Proper changelogs will be updated soon
AOSP R & S variants will be provided soon
Note: MI Turbo Charge does not work in MIUI thanks to Xiaomi's incomplete sources

resources.title: v1.0_beta-14
changelogs: Under Beta Phase. Proper changelogs will be updated soon

resources.title: v13.4

resources.title: v16.0
changelogs: Merge kernel 4.4.299, 4.4.300
mm: hardwire force page_cluster = 1 for zram
f2fs: Force nobarrier fsync mode
msm: wlan: update db.txt fixup some countries reg info
Revert dts: remove rcupdate from bootargs
